title: Overthink
description: A blog about overthinking, writing, life, feelings, thoughts, ruminations and everything in between.
content: As a chronic overthinker, this blog captures some of the topics that have recently drilled deep. The topics that keep me up at night or wake me in the middle or insistently slide into my conscious mind's purview as I'm praciticing being present. Whether it's thinking about overthinking or a case I've been obsessively following, you'll find postsÂ on writing, life, feelings, thoughts, ruminations and everything in between.
